name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_NIGHT】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [ko7ypXM_-yQ]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Countdown sequence with flashbacks of previous years (2019-2025) leading to the 2026 New Year's Party.
Tokino Sora performs a song on stage with blue penlights in the audience.

subtitles.original: Are You Ready?
subtitles.english: Are You Ready?

subtitles.original: 未完成の地図を輝きに変えて
subtitles.english: Turning this unfinished map into radiance.

subtitles.original: 誰にも真似できない足跡を見ていて
subtitles.english: Watch these footprints that no one else can imitate.

subtitles.original: みんな！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 走り出した願いは加速していくスピード
subtitles.english: My wish has started running, speeding up.

subtitles.original: 目に映るものに戸惑うんなら
subtitles.english: If you're bewildered by what you see in your eyes,

subtitles.original: 仮想世界だって私が見えてるでしょ
subtitles.english: Even in a virtual world, you can see me, right?

subtitles.original: キミだけに在る世界が正解
subtitles.english: The world that exists only for you is the correct answer.

subtitles.original: 時々は泣き出したくもなるよ
subtitles.english: Sometimes I even want to burst into tears.

subtitles.original: だけどドキドキが胸締め付け止まらないから
subtitles.english: But the excitement tightens my chest and won't stop.

subtitles.original: 大きくなってるんだってキミに届けたいよ
subtitles.english: It's getting bigger, I want to reach you.

subtitles.original: 素顔になってたんだね未来も切り開くよ
subtitles.english: I've become my true self, I'll open up the future too.

subtitles.original: 明けない夜だって光のない朝だって
subtitles.english: Even a night that won't dawn, even a morning without light,

subtitles.original: 平気だよ一緒に笑いたいから
subtitles.english: It's okay, because I want to laugh together with you.

subtitles.original: 綺麗になってるんだってチョビっと自信持って
subtitles.english: I'm becoming beautiful, having a little confidence.

subtitles.original: だから願ってたんだね此処で歌いたいと
subtitles.english: That's why I was wishing to sing right here.

subtitles.original: いつもよりもちょっと大きな声でもっと
subtitles.english: With a voice a little louder than usual, more!

subtitles.original: 自分で決めてもいいんだよね… 正解！
subtitles.english: It's okay to decide for yourself, right... Correct!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: 声がちょっとちっちゃいかも！
subtitles.english: Your voices might be a little quiet!

subtitles.original: スポットライトをもうちょっと
subtitles.english: Turn the spotlight up a little more,

subtitles.original: 当ててきて最高潮
subtitles.english: Shine it on me and let's reach the climax.

subtitles.original: 不安も全部巻き込んで
subtitles.english: Rolling up all my anxieties too,

subtitles.original: 上がるステージへ
subtitles.english: Heading to the rising stage.

subtitles.original: お淑やかに立って
subtitles.english: Standing gracefully,

subtitles.original: これが私のロックンロール
subtitles.english: This is my Rock 'n' Roll.

subtitles.original: キミだけに見せたいの… 正解！
subtitles.english: I want to show it only to you... Correct!

subtitles.original: みんな声出していけるかー！
subtitles.english: Can everyone get their voices out?!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: オイッス！
subtitles.english: Oissu!
